full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA nI'I BSGRUB THABS ZAB MO BZHUGS SO, , *, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SGO NAS BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I TSIGS MCHOD BYA TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,MA nI'I BSGRUB THABS ZAB MO NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(DE LTAR PHAN YON CHE LA BSGRUB SLA BA'I, ,MAN NGAG ZAB MO KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS PA 'DI, ,RIGS CHOS SLOB BU CHOS DBANG RDO RJE YIS, ,BSKUL BA'I BYED PAS 'DAM PAS BYIN RLABS PA'I` `YO GI DZNYA NA BADZRA ZHES BYA BA YIS, ,SNGON BYON DAM PA RNAMS KYIS GSUNGS PA BZHIN, ,RANG LO GYA LNGAR YI GER 'BRIS PA 'DI, ,GLEGS BUR BKOD PO RAB 'BYAMS BLO GROS SO,, ,,)
